content.question: Which of the following most directly facilitated the trend in sugar consumption in Britain represented in the chart?

choices.label: The enclosure movement in Britain increased agricultural productivity.
British farmers implemented a three-field crop rotation system.
Britain succeeded in driving the Portuguese and Spanish largely out of the India trade.
The wars of the eighteenth century left Britain the dominant naval power in the Atlantic.

content.answer: The wars of the eighteenth century left Britain the dominant naval power in the Atlantic.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
